Package com.game.core.entities

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.game.core.behaviour.base.PositionWrapper
com.game.core.behaviour.base.GameObject
com.game.core.behaviour.base.CollidableGameObject
com.game.core.entities.Entity
com.game.core.entities.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, Positionable, Renderable, Updatable
public class Player extends Entity
Represents a player in the game with abilities such as movement, shooting, respawning, and applying effects. Manages player properties like health, shield, and kills count.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a Player instance with specified parameters.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(PlayerSpawner spawner, Bounds hitbox, Tile tile, SceneConfig.BulletConfig bulletConfig, int maxHealth, int maxBulletsCount, float shieldHitboxMultiplier, float bulletsReloadDelay, float bulletsCooldown, float defaultSpeed, float rotationSpeed, boolean isInfinityBulletsMode)
      Constructs a Player instance with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      spawner - The PlayerSpawner responsible for spawning this player.
      hitbox - The bounding box for collision detection.
      tile - The graphical tile representing the player.
      bulletConfig - Configuration for the player's bullets.
      maxHealth - The maximum health of the player.
      maxBulletsCount - Maximum number of bullets the player can store.
      shieldHitboxMultiplier - Multiplier for the hitbox size when the shield is active.
      bulletsReloadDelay - The delay before reloading bullets.
      bulletsCooldown - The cooldown time between shooting bullets.
      defaultSpeed - The default movement speed of the player.
      rotationSpeed - The speed of rotation for the player.
      isInfinityBulletsMode - Specifies if the player has infinite bullets.

  • Method Details

    • applyEffect

      public boolean applyEffect(Effect effect)
      Applies a specified effect to the player if no other active effect exists.
      Parameters:
      effect - The effect to be applied.
      Returns:
      True if the effect is successfully applied, false otherwise.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage, Player attacker)
      Reduces the player's health by the specified damage amount and marks the player as dead if health falls below zero.
      Parameters:
      damage - The amount of damage to inflict.
      attacker - The player attacking this player (null if there is no attacker).

    • respawn

      public void respawn(float x, float y)
      Respawns the player at the specified position with full health and temporary shield.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate for respawning.
      y - The y-coordinate for respawning.

    • incrementKillsCount

      public void incrementKillsCount()
      Increments the player's kills count by one.

    • changeRotationDirection

      public void changeRotationDirection()
      Changes the player's rotation direction to the opposite direction.

    • onKeyPressed

      public void onKeyPressed()
      Handles behavior when a key is pressed, including starting movement and changing rotation direction.

    • onKeyReleased

      public void onKeyReleased()
      Stops player movement when the key is released.

    • update

      public void update(double deltaTime)

    • onCollision

      public void onCollision(CollisionVisitor visitor, Collidable other)
      Handles collisions with other objects by invoking the collision visitor's logic.
      Parameters:
      visitor - The collision visitor handling the collision logic.
      other - The other collidable object involved in the collision.

    • render

      public void render(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Renders the player on the game canvas, including a visual effect if the shield is active.
      Overrides:
      render in class Entity
      Parameters:
      gc - The graphics context for rendering.

    • drawEffectCircle

      public void drawEffectCircle(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Draws a circular visual effect around the player.
      Parameters:
      gc - The graphics context for rendering the circle.
      color - The color of the effect circle.

      Checks if the player currently has a shield.
      Returns:

    • setHasShield

      public void setHasShield(boolean hasShield)
      Activates or deactivates the player's shield and adjusts the hitbox size accordingly.
      Parameters:
      hasShield - True to activate the shield, false to deactivate it.
